pull_request.title: jglobal.jst.go.jp
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address https://jglobal.jst.go.jp/detail?JGLOBAL_ID=202102228214159594 ### Add your comment and screenshots
screenshot - PC ![](https://i.slow.pics/ubpPrIIi.png)

screenshot - Mobile ![](https://i.slow.pics/lIMt55xP.png)

### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: aliexpress.com
issue.body:
Помогите с правилом косметического характера на али. Как запретить при клике по полному превью товара увеличивать картинку, сделав её кликабельной, дабы можно её было открыть через ПКМ ?
![Screenshot_20210805_182000](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12525093/128317044-198b3151-116f-45b9-a347-7f60e8eca7e0.jpg)

comment.body: Спасибо. Помогло. Хотя картинка при лонг-тапе продолжает масштабироваться. ну да ладно. Или там надо было второе старое правило добавить в довесок ?

issue.title: www.geeksforgeeks.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/how-to-install-chrome-in-ubuntu/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.geeksforgeeks.org%2Fhow-to-install-chrome-in-ubuntu%2F) ### Comment > The extension seems to completely stop working on firefox only. It works fine on other browsers like Chrome and Brave. However, when I enable the extension on Firefox, any website I visit, unless they don't have ads, it will show. I have to manually keep blocking these ads and the number of ads blocked on any website always counts 0. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/r1w5z5h.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.181 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base
